000000000000 00000 000 00000 1110011 ECALL

000000000001 00000 000 00000 1110011 EBREAK

csr rs1 001 rd 1110011 CSRRW
csr rs1 010 rd 1110011 CSRRS
csr rs1 011 rd 1110011 CSRRC
